result.title: Publications on the survival of unwanted catch
result.description: Manuscripts for scientific publication on: a) Manuscript for scientific publication on factors affecting immediate and long-term survival of discarded fish; b) Manuscript for scientific publication on using camera-derived movement descriptors for estimating vitality; c) survival estimates of target and non-target species in released in different fisheries; and d) Manuscript for scientific publication on the development of safe handling practices to promote the survival of released species, both target and non-target, in accordance with the EU Landing Obligation
